original_text: I have commanded my sanctified ones, I have also called my mighty ones for mine anger, even them that rejoice in my highness.
korean_text: 내가 거룩하게 구별한 자들에게 명령하고 나의 위엄을 기뻐하는 용사들을 불러 나의 노여움을 전하게 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: I have commanded my sanctified ones
I have also called my mighty ones
even them that rejoice in my highness
